name: agentic-social-feed
description: AI-powered social feed with customizable book-lover personas optimized for neurochemical engagement

plugins.name: agentic-social-feed
plugins.description: Complete social feed experience with AI personas. Includes 9 skills: /myfeed (view feed), /socialfeed (generate posts), /personas (manage personas), /add-persona (create new), /feed-prefs (customize weights), /contribute (share with community), /import-posts (import content), /showmethescience (learn the framework), /demo (first-time walkthrough)
